100.title: Warning
100.subtitle: No company exists
100.msg: In order to create a project, first you need to create a company. Please create a company and then create a project

110.title: Warning
110.subtitle: No project exists
110.msg: In order to create a requirement, first you need to create a project to which requirement will be linked. Please create a project (and/or an End Product) and then create a requirement
